description: Commands to manage message read-receipts in a chat thread of a Communication Service resource.

commands.name: az communication chat message receipt list
commands.summary: Gets read receipts of a chat thread.
commands.syntax:
az communication chat message receipt list --thread
                                           [--access-token]
                                           [--endpoint]
                                           [--skip]
examples: az communication chat message receipt list --thread "19:a-bcd=xyz" --skip "4"

commands.name: az communication chat message receipt send
commands.summary: Posts a read receipt event to a chat thread, on behalf of a user.
commands.syntax:
az communication chat message receipt send --message-id
                                           --thread
                                           [--access-token]
                                           [--endpoint]
examples: az communication chat message receipt send --thread "19:a-bcd=xyz" --message-id "12345678"
